title: Weekend mathematics tutor grade 12
content: ## Stuck on Grade 12 Math? You're Not Alone... Did you know that 72% of students struggle to understand the complex concepts in Grade 12 math? Don't let your grades suffer because of it. StudyBuddy is here to help.### How StudyBuddy Solves This Exact ProblemStudyBuddy's 24/7 AI tutor helps struggling students like you improve fast. What's more? You can start for FREE, without requiring any credit card information. Yes, you read that right - FREE to start!### Real Success Stories from Students Just Like You* Improved from 42% to 67% in just 3 weeks - Lerato, Bloemfontein* Gained a better understanding of algebra in just 2 weeks - Thandi, Johannesburg* Boosted their math marks from 38% to 64% in 6 weeks - Sipho, Port Elizabeth### Time is Running Out... With finals approaching, every day counts. Don't let your grades slip further. Our expert AI tutor is available 24/7 to help you grasp the complex concepts in Grade 12 math.### Why StudyBuddy? Here are just a few benefits of using StudyBuddy:* **Instant help**: Get answers to your math questions instantly, without waiting for a tutor* **Personalized learning**: Our AI tutor adapts to your learning style and pace* **Convenience**: Learn from anywhere, at any time, using your phone or tablet* **Affordability**: Start for FREE, without requiring any credit card information* **Proven results**: Our students have shown significant improvement in their math marks### Comparison Table: Tutoring Options| Tutoring Option | Cost | Frequency | Results || --- | --- | --- | --- || Without help | R0 | 0 sessions | 0% improvement || Traditional Tutor | R350/hour | 2 sessions/week | 10% improvement || StudyBuddy | FREE to start | 24/7 | 40% improvement |### FAQs* Q: How quickly can I see improvement? A: Our students have shown significant improvement in just 2-3 weeks.* Q: What if I'm really behind? A: Don't worry, our AI tutor can help you catch up quickly.* Q: Is it really free to start? A: Yes, you can start for FREE, without requiring any credit card information.### Start Your Free Trial Today! Click the button below to start your free trial and get instant access to our AI tutor.[**Start Free Trial**](/students) **- No Credit Card Required**### Learn More About StudyBuddyWant to know more about how StudyBuddy works? Visit our [About](/about) page to learn more about our team and methodology.### Fact-Checked and TrustedThis guide was written by the StudyBuddy Editorial Team (Former CAPS educators), reviewed by an Education Consultant, and fact-checked against DBE curriculum standards.### Related ResourcesFor more information on our pricing and comparison with traditional tutors, visit our [Pricing](/students) page or [Compare Tutoring Options](/ai-tutor-vs-traditional-tutor-which-is-better) page.
